description: This course examines the classifications of anesthetics, their pharmacokinetics and pharmacokinetics and the most common side effects and adverse effects. Adjuvant therapies most commonly utilized with anesthesia are reviewed and their interactions are explained. Anesthetic techniques related to pain management are presented. Monitoring techniques employed with the administration of anesthetics are reviewed.
name: PHARMACOLOGY OF ANESTHETICS AND ACCESSORY DRUGS

section.name: PHARMACOLOGY OF ANESTHETICS AND ACCESSORY DRUGS
